title: Activity: Basic Launch
description: Complete the setup process for launching into the tool from Moodle.

title: Activity: Deep Linking
description: Learn how to create and import links into the Platform from your tool. We will explore custom parameters.

title: Activity: Names & Roles Provisioning
description: Learn how to enable and configure key LTI services such as Assignment and Grade Services and how to integrate them with your tool.

title: Activity: Assignments and Grades
description: Send data from your tool into the Platform. We will explore the Gradebook and the workflows for managing grades from a tool.

title: My Digital Assistant
description: A digital assistant able to support you with your work.
